channel.title: Adding NPC'S Objects
channel.description:
Hello, Im Sp3c ;)
I Have a server up and running now and tbh im a bit confused.
I Go into my autospawn.cfg ( And open with wordpad )
Okay I Want to add say a Man At My Home.. So i will do: ::mypos and get teh x+y Coords So lets say i want to add this then:
Spawn= 1 2851 3348 0 0 0 0 0 2 Or Something along the lines of that.
Now i tried adding it under spawn = 1860 2853 3353 0 0 0 0 0 2
And i clicked compile It was fine.. so run the server again Error at Autospawn.cfg Etc etc Saying that line that i tried adding.
SO Where do i put my new spawn i want? At the bottom or something? SOmeone please try and help ;)

item.title: Adding NPC'S Objects
item.dc:creator: @Sp3c_u_k0 Sp3c u k0
item.description:
@Sp3c_u_k0 wrote:

Ok i did but this happened AGAIN

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2009, 09:47:45 am[/size][hr]Please can someone reply to my error?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC'S Objects
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Yea, just use TAB to separate the numbers.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC'S Objects
item.dc:creator: @Sp3c_u_k0 Sp3c u k0
item.description:
@Sp3c_u_k0 wrote:

[quote="_ikram, post:2, topic:281981"]In future it’s more appriciatable if you use the search which is located on your top right corner.
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html[/quote]

Thanks, I will do sorry about that =][br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2009, 09:26:08 am[/size][hr][quote=“Jordiescape, post:3, topic:281981”]You need to use the TAB button to space the numbers out, or it won’t work.

/Lol.[/quote]

Okay so i can put the Npc anywhere in the autospawn doesnt have to start like at the bottom or anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC'S Objects
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

You need to use the TAB button to space the numbers out, or it won’t work.

/Lol.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

In future it’s more appriciatable if you use the search which is located on your top right corner.
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html

Hello, Im Sp3c

I Have a server up and running now and tbh im a bit confused.

I Go into my autospawn.cfg ( And open with wordpad )

Okay I Want to add say a Man At My Home… So i will do: ::mypos and get teh x+y Coords

And i clicked compile It was fine… so run the server again Error at Autospawn.cfg Etc etc Saying that line that i tried adding.

SO Where do i put my new spawn i want? At the bottom or something? SOmeone please try and help
